text:
[Verse]
We dance under the moonlight
Stars above shining bright
Feet moving through the night
Lost in the rhythm's flight

[Verse]
Hands up feeling so free
Heartbeats sync with the beat
Night's breeze sets us free
In the moment so sweet

[Chorus]
Under the moonlight glow
Everything feels so slow
In this dance we know
Together we flow

[Verse]
Steps turn into a spin
With you I always win
Laughs blend in the din
Love's where we begin

[Bridge]
Midnight magic we share
Hopes and dreams in the air
No worries no despair
In your eyes we dare

[Chorus]
Under the moonlight glow
Everything feels so slow
In this dance we know
Together we flow
title: Dancing Under the Moonlight
